tests.name: Interpolation
tests.desc: A lambda's return value should be interpolated.

tests.name: Interpolation - Expansion
tests.desc: A lambda's return value should be parsed.

tests.name: Interpolation - Multiple Calls
tests.desc: Interpolated lambdas should only be called once.

tests.name: Interpolation - Caches
tests.desc: Lambda caches should not disrupt normal context operations.

tests.name: Escaping
tests.desc: Lambda results should be appropriately escaped.

tests.name: Section
tests.desc: Lambdas used for sections should receive the raw section string.

tests.name: Section - Expansion
tests.desc: Lambdas used for sections should have their results parsed.

tests.name: Section - Multiple Calls
tests.desc: Lambdas used for sections should not simply cache the first response.

tests.name: Inverted Section
tests.desc: Lambdas used for inverted sections should be considered truthy.
